claim: Flublok is approved for adults 18 years and older
explanation: The image is a snippet of the Flublok (Influenza Vaccine) full prescribing information. Under the “INDICATIONS AND USAGE” section it states: “Flublok is approved for use in persons 18 years of age and older.” This directly confirms that Flublok is approved for adults aged 18 and older, thereby supporting the claim.
